## About me

Most recently, I worked as a lecturer and researcher at [HS Bremen](https://www.hs-bremen.de/en/).

Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the [Institute for Analysis and Numerics](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/institute.shtml) of the [University of Münster](https://www.uni-muenster.de/en/).

I earned my PhD (*Dr. rer. nat.* in Mathematics) at the [University of Bremen](https://www.uni-bremen.de/en/).

Further details can be found on the subpages above.

<a rel="me"  href="https://mastodon.de/@DUlbrich"></a>
